text: The 2004 Rally Argentina (formally the 24º Rally Argentina) was the eighth round of the 2004 World Rally Championship season. It was won by Carlos Sainz, the last win of his rally career. == Entry list == {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! No. ! Driver ! Co-Driver ! Entrant !
